title: A Day After Earthquake, Nepal Struck By Aftershocks
teaser: Donatella Lorch, a freelance journalist in Kathmandu, gives NPR's Arun Rath an update on the effects of Saturday's devastating quake. She says people are taking it "hour by hour and day by day."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
